content: I know it's short notice, but we are going to hold an IPS FHIR Connectathon 26 Track orientation call on Wednesday this week (December 16) at 11:00 AM EST / 16:00 UTC / 17:00 CET (at the same time and meeting details as our usual IPS calls on alternate weeks). These are the meeting coordinates. This is the track proposal as we have it currently (further updates are anticipated).
